title: "Mordekaiser will be less toxic to play against"

replies.body:
Yeah the Q mechanic seems incredibly asinine to me. The goal in him being a juggernaut is to do massive damage to anyone foolish enough to stay close to him. With the way the mechanic works, however, at rank 5 his 3rd Q has a +2.7 AD and +1.8 AP ratio on a single auto. The Q doesn't have to be stacked up on the same target though, so he can just Q, auto a minion twice, then flash auto someone for a +1.8 AP ratio on a single auto.

This isn't going to encourage a Juggernaut playstyle, it's going to encourage Gunblade->Sorc Boots->Zhonya's->Voidstaff->Deathcap->Situational where Morde's playstle is just to build up his 3rd Q then flash 100-0 an enemy champ with 3rd Q/ult/rest of rotation -> Zhonya's active to turn any fight into a 4v6. THIS IS EXACTLY THE TOXIC PLAYSTYLE THEY WERE TRYING TO REMOVE WITH THE REWORK!!!

Any fight where his flash is up and he has something to safely AA twice without getting stunlocked (or with that build, burst down), and people aren't running away from him when they see him using Q1 and Q2, expecting the flash Q3 the way experienced players know when to expect Yasuo's tornadoes.

And some backlines require flash *and* another gapcloser to reach (e.g. flash Vi ult), which Morde isn't going to have.
